edu.ncsu.csc316.rentals.manager

Class VehicleRentalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.rentals.manager.VehicleRentalManager

  • public class VehicleRentalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class that handles construction of the graph as well as functionality relating to generating the shortest path or querying adjacent edges for a given vertex (day)
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

      Constructs a new Rental manager with the given input files

      Gets the adjacency list
      java.lang.String getRentals(int start, int end)
      Returns the String representation of the rentals that minimize the total cost from the start day to the end day (or for as many days from the start day while rentals are possible).
      java.lang.String getRentalsForDay(int day)
      Returns the String representation of the rentals that are available for the requested day.

    • Method Detail

      • getRentals

        public java.lang.String getRentals(int start,
                                   int end)
        Returns the String representation of the rentals that minimize the total cost from the start day to the end day (or for as many days from the start day while rentals are possible).
        Parameters:
        start - - the start day as an integer
        end - - the end day as an integer
        Returns:
        the String representation of the rentals

      • getRentalsForDay

        public java.lang.String getRentalsForDay(int day)
        Returns the String representation of the rentals that are available for the requested day.
        Parameters:
        day - - the day for which to retrieve available rentals
        Returns:
        the String representation of the rentals
